name: Herodes
description:
It is the year 2197. Humanity has never been closer to immortality - there is no disease that can't be cured, no virus that can't be defeated. Until now.
You will use cutting-edge technology to shrink yourself down and hunt down a new and mysterious virus that can't be defeated by any other means.

This is Herodes.



Herodes takes place in the not-too-distant future, where medicine and technology have evolved to such an extent that the C.L.R.T. (Cell Level Reduction Technology) could be created. Diseases have been eradicated - there is no virus that can't be defeated.

Until a mysterious new virus arrives and threatens the survival of the entire human race. It can't be defeated by any known treatment, no pill can stop it - which leaves only one alternative available: eradicating it through force. Inside an atomic-powered vehicle, you'll be shrunken to the cellular level and inserted into the bowels of Patient Zero to hunt down and destroy this virus.





You'll explore the human body in a way you've never done before, rendered in incredible pixel art graphics. You'll fight and defeat diverse enemies through fluid, shoot'em up-style gameplay. Herodes also boasts a beautiful and unique soundtrack that makes the experience even more impressive and immersive.
